Class Dictonary

java.lang.Object
  Dictonary

public class Dictonary
extends java.lang.Object

Contains the arraylist of all the words, of both version of english and its pirate version. Contains the translator as well as a 3 word/phrace generator.

Version:
30.11.2013
Author:
Sta17

Method Detail

addWord

public void addWord(java.lang.String english,
                    java.lang.String pirate)
Adds new word to Dictonary, also check if word already exists and if input is empty or whitespace.

Parameters:
english - english is the english version of the word.
pirate - pirate is the pirate version of the word.

Gen

public java.lang.String Gen()
Generates a 3 word/phrace sentance once called, does not print

Returns:
temp - the generated 3 word/phrace, sentance

load

public void load(java.lang.String fileName)
load mechanism, loads information from a file, that matches parameter filename.

Parameters:
fileName - - the name of the file from which the information is retrieved.

removeWord

public void removeWord(java.lang.String word)
Enables a user to delete a word from the dictonary arraylist. Searches thought the arraylist to see if input matches arraylist content.

Parameters:
word - word is the word you want to have removed.

save

public void save(java.lang.String fileName)
Save mechanism, saves information in to a file, that matches parameter filename.

Parameters:
fileName - - the name of the file to which the information is stored.

toString

public java.lang.String toString()
Provides information on and words of the Arraylist.

Overrides:
toString in class java.lang.Object
Returns:
temp - arraylist size and all the words in it.

TranslatetoEng

public java.lang.String TranslatetoEng(java.lang.String phrace)
Translate to the english language. Search thought dictonary, and send back english phraces

Returns:
phrace - the translated phrace, from phrace to english

TranslatetoPir

public java.lang.String TranslatetoPir(java.lang.String phrace)
Translate to Pirate speak. thought dictonary, and send back pirate phraces.

Returns:
phrace - the translated phrace, from english to pirate
